titles.title: A concurrent resolution providing for a conditional adjournment of the House from January 8 to January 20, 1987.

action.text: Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.
Received in the Senate and referred to the Committee on Appropriations.

bill.summary: 1/6/1987--Introduced. Provides for an adjournment of the House of Representatives from January 8, 1987, until January 20, 1987.
